thread.title: Southampton are close to signing both Napoli’s £17m striker Manolo Gabbiadini and Spartak Moscow’s Serdar Tasci
thread.title_full: Southampton are close to signing both Napoli’s £17m striker Manolo Gabbiadini and Spartak Moscow’s Serdar Tasci

author: whaughton
title: Southampton are close to signing both Napoli’s £17m striker Manolo Gabbiadini and Spartak Moscow’s Serdar Tasci
text:
Comments SOUTHAMPTON are close to signing Napoli striker Manolo Gabbiadiani for £17million. 
The clubs are in advance talks to thrash out a deal with £13.6 paid upfront with £3.4m in add-ons for the 25-year-old. Reuters 4 Napoli’s Manolo Gabbiadini is close to joining Southampton 
According to Sky Italia, the Italian international will be offered a four-year-deal worth £40,000 a week with Napoli getting 10 per cent of any sell-on fee. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Southampton news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Gabbiadini moved to Naples from Sampdoria in 2015 and has scored five goals this season. 
Saints boss Claude Puel has been on the hunt for another striker after the long term absence of Charlie Austin with a shoulder injury. Getty Images Manolo Gabbiadini expected to arrive at St Mary’s before Tuesday deadline Reuters Claude Puel has lost Charlie Austin to long term injury Getty Images Serdar Tasci spent a short spell on loan at Bayern Munich this season Goals of the Fourth Round : Watch the best strikes from the FA Cup weekend 
ESPN are reporting the Saints are also close to landing Spartak Moscow defender Serdar Tasci on loan until the end of the season. 
The 29-year-old who joined Spartak in 2013 is out of contract in the summer with the Russian's willing to move him on after making just nine appearances this season. related stories Bould move Arsenal fans call for Steve Bould to take over as boss after Gunners win 5-0 with Arsene Wenger banned BECK IN BUSINESS Southampton 0 Arsenal 5: Danny Welbeck marks injury return with brace before Theo Walcott hits hat-trick at former team in Gunners rout PRAISE THE CLAUDE Liverpool outcast Mamadou Sakho keen on moving to Southampton to link up with Claude Puel Transfers live All the latest breaking news and gossip from the January transfer window GUNS AND POSES Arsenal stars lark about for the cameras ahead of FA Cup battle at Southampton 
The Premier League side are keen bolster their centre back options with the influential Virgil van Dijk out injured and the sale of Jose Fonte to West Ham.
